0.question:
Consider a bag containing 8 blue marbles and 3 white marbles. The marbles will be drawn one by one without replacement, and the sequence of blues (B) and whites (W) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears consecutively during the draws.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) EDDEEE.
(b) DDDDD.
(c) DEEEDD.

1.question:
Consider a deck of playing cards with 5 blue cards and 2 yellow cards. The deck will be shuffled, and a card will be drawn 15 times. The sequence of blue (B) and yellow (Y) cards will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the card.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) ZLZZLZL.
(b) LLZLZZLZ.
(c) ZLLLZZZZ.

2.question:
Consider a bag filled with 8 blue marbles and 4 white marbles. The bag will be shaken, and a marble will be drawn 15 times with replacement. The sequence of blue (B) and white (W) marbles will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marble.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) LLHHHLLL.
(b) HHLHHHL.
(c) HHHHHLHL.

3.question:
Consider a bag containing 8 blue marbles and 4 red marbles. The bag will be shaken and a single marble will be drawn 10 times, with the color recorded each time as either B (blue) or R (red). You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a $50 gift card if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marble.

What is the new problem you want to create based on the above instructions?Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) CZZZC.
(b) CZCC.
(c) CZCCZ.

4.question:
Consider a bag containing 10 marbles, 7 of which are green and 3 are purple. The marbles will be drawn from the bag without replacement 15 times and the sequence of greens (G) and purples (P) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) GGPGGG.
(b) GGGPG.
(c) PPPGPP.
